description: Unique system identifier for this budget record (primary key).
General ledger account code to which this budget applies; links to the chart of accounts.
Fiscal year the budget period belongs to.
Internal code for the fiscal period within the fiscal year; likely a system-generated period key, not the human-readable month. Confirm with SME.
Numeric sequence of the period within the fiscal year (e.g., month number).
Optional description of the financial period or budget line for reporting; meaning may vary. Confirm with SME.
Start date (inclusive) of the fiscal period this budget covers.
End date (inclusive) of the fiscal period this budget covers.
Amount budgeted for the GL account for this period, in the systemâ€™s base currency.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Application-captured timestamp of the last user modification; may duplicate system last_modified. Confirm with SME.
User ID that created this record (application login or service account).
Timestamp when this record was created by a user (audit trail).
User ID of the person or process that last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record (auditing field).
